product_name: Keen Yogui Arts Sandals - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soothe your tired feet after a long day on the trail or at the office. The men's Keen Yogui Arts Sandals make comfort a top priority with lightweight, breathable uppers and cushy molded footbeds. Perforated, injection-molded EVA uppers offer cool, breathable comfort in warm weather; slip-on style allows easy on/off. Textured footbeds lightly massage feet. Durable rubber outsoles on the men's Keen Yogui Arts Sandals deliver reliable traction on wet or uneven surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Soothe your tired feet after a long day on the trail or at the office. The men's Keen Yogui Arts Sandals make comfort a top priority with lightweight, breathable uppers and cushy molded footbeds.
